title: Gamma-Lin 1300 90count

cleaned_text: 1300 is a dietary supplement to support skin and nerve health and premenstrual functional needs.* Gamma-Lin is a pure vegetable oil processed from the seeds of the Evening Primrose plant. Oil of Evening Primrose is 70% Linoleic Acid and is unique in providing a direct dietary source of the vital Gamma Linolenic Acid. DaVinci® Laboratories guarantees a minimum of 117 mg (9%) Gamma Linolenic Acid (GLA) per 1300 mg capsule and a minimum of 45 mg (9%) Gamma Linolenic Acid (GLA) per 500 mg capsule. Gamma Linolenic Acid (GLA) is converted by natural processes in the body to prostaglandins, which have a range of important functions such as regulation of brain function and the immune system. Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 1 softgel one-half hour before each meal, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
